title: Cerceris Wasp Colonies
name: Cerceris Wasp Colonies
description:
Emerald Ash Borer (EAB), an invasive pest of ash trees, recently colonized the state of Connecticut (summer 2012).  We use our native Cerceris Wasp colonies to survey for the presence of EAB.  Cerceris Wasp predates a group of wood boring beetles called Buprestid beetles, of which EAB is part of this group.  This bio-surveillance method will indicate when EAB colonizes the property.
